channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Fraud Squad
channel.desc: The NHS Counter Fraud Authority investigates a shocking case of a trusted GP practice manager who fiddled the books for years to siphon hundreds of thousands of pounds into her own bank account. The alarm is raised when a GP discovers some odd payments leaving the surgery's bank account. But when he asks the manager about the payments, he becomes suspicious and calls in the Fraud Squad.
